availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Frank Lane Wolford (Rep from Adair County)

body.p: Born near Columbia, Adair County, Ky., September 2, 1817. Admitted to the bar and commenced practice in Liberty, Casey County, Ky. Member of the State House of Representatives in 1847, 1848, and 1865. Served as Colonel of the First Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry 1861-1864. Died in Columbia, Ky on August 2, 1895.

bibl.p: "Wolford, Frank Lane ." Biographical Directory of the United States Congress. Accessed May 06, 2017. http://bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=W000681; Organization Index to Pension Files of Veterans Who Served Between 1861 and 1900 National Archives and Records Administration, T289, Roll 170, Cavalry, Regiment 1, Company Field & Staff , Wolford, Frank.
